parameters:
\SE[1]I've been studying the language of flowers recently. They
say it's good to put your feelings into each gift you give!

\SE[2]I made this in a flower field. \!\SE[15]I'm going to give
it to Laura as a present!

Some accessories have the ability to add skills. The Freesia
flower decoration allows you to use the healing skill, so let's
equip it right away.

\SE[1]I've been studying the language of flowers recently. \.They
say it's good to put your feelings into each gift!

My husband is always talking about pigs! Laura-chan, say
something to him too!

The other day, Tita asked me, Was I really born from a pig? Can
you believe that?

That can't be true, right!? Ah... Maybe I should just take Tita
and go back to Yurisine already...
